name: Vehicle Weapon File
summary: Weapon file used by Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, a Jedi game where the player chooses to follow the light or dark side; contains data for vehicle weapons that are accessed throughout the game; includes speed, damage, and ammo per shot specifications for the weapon; also contains links to shot, muzzle, and impact sound effects for the weapon.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Raven Software Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy

macos.display_name: Raven Software Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy
